name: balance-game
description:
(Our team name is Blendercult but we split up into Czar for this jam)

A short game, pretty much unfinished. We had more planned but being a senior is hard, and we put too much effort into the art which made the whole process pretty unsustainable. The objective of this prototype is to knock all the enemies off, good luck!

NOTE: If the game is too big on smaller screens, open the options menu by sinking the respective crate on the menu screen and change the GFX scaling to 1x. You can also adjust volumes and stuff from there.
